Article Title: Kelly Piquet reveals who her and Max Verstappen’s daughter resembles, explains her bond with elder sister Penelope
Article Text:
Max Verstappen and Kelly Piquet with Lily and Penelope (Image credit: Instagram)

Kelly Piquet says daughter Lily is “a beautiful mix” of her and Max Verstappen



Kelly Piquet answers questions about Lily

Kelly Piquet answers fan questions about Brazilian vacation with Max Verstappen

Max Verstappen and Kelly Piquet in Brazil (Image credit: Instagram)

Red Bull star Max Verstappen is back from his Brazilian holiday and has immersed himself in preparations for the F1 2026 season. While the four-time world champion got busy with the new livery launch and geared up for the first test, his girlfriend Kelly Piquet used the time to conduct a fan interaction on Instagram. During the session, she answered questions about their baby girl Lily, her bond with her elder daughter Penelope, and her goals for 2026. She also responded to a question about whom Lily resembles more, Piquet or Verstappen.Kelly Piquet took to her Instagram Stories to host an Ask Me Anything session with her fans. She mentioned that it took her ten minutes to figure out the technical process on Instagram, as she was doing it after a long time.A fan asked Kelly Piquet, “How is P doing with her little sis?” to which she replied, “These sisters are completely in love with each other and it’s the best thing I could ever witness. I could not have asked for more!” When another fan asked whether Lily looks more like her mom or her dad, she answered, “I want to say a beautiful mix.”Penelope is Piquet’s six-year-old daughter from her previous relationship with former Red Bull driver Daniil Kvyat.Kelly Piquet gave birth to her and Max Verstappen’s first child, Lily, in May last year.When a fan enquired about her winter break, Piquet described it as “way too short but so so special.” Piquet and Max Verstappen were holidaying in Brazil with her two daughters, Penelope and Lily. They spent time with her family and other near and dear ones, and also introduced Lily to the sea for the first time.Piquet also shared a group photo from her Rio de Janeiro trip when asked about the best part of the vacation. The picture features Piquet holding Lily in her arms, alongside Max Verstappen and Penelope, as the family of four posed with their loved ones they met during the trip.After Lily’s birth, Piquet is now focusing on her health. When asked how she is doing now, Kelly Piquet replied, “Still a little tired from last year’s whirlwind but so glad for the calm month of January.”On the question of her 2026 goals, Piquet said that in terms of health, she plans to build more muscle mass and maintain a stable workout routine.
Article Summary: Red bull driver max verstappen is back from his brazilian holiday. His girlfriend kelly piquet hosted an ask me anything session on instagram. She answered questions about their baby girl lily, her bond with her elder daughter penelope, and her goals for 2026.

Article Title: Bill Belichick lands new ESPN role as North Carolina looks ahead after 4–8 season
Article Text:
Bill Belichick (Image Via Getty)

Bill Belichick returns to TV as ESPN adds him to national title broadcast

Bill Belichick is back on television. Just weeks after finishing a difficult first college football season at the University of North Carolina, the 73-year-old coaching legend has landed a new role with ESPN. The network confirmed that Bill Belichick will appear on the ACC Network’s broadcast of the College Football Playoff national championship game, set to be played in South Florida at Hard Rock Stadium.The game will feature the Indiana Hoosiers against the University of Miami Hurricanes and is scheduled for a 7:30 p.m. kickoff. ESPN announced that Belichick will be part of the on-air team, marking his return to TV while he continues working as head coach of the Tar Heels in Chapel Hill.ESPN said Bill Belichick will be paired with former Miami and Georgia head coach Mark Richt for the ACC Network’s coverage.The move comes only weeks after North Carolina ended a rough season with a 4–8 record, missing both a bowl game and the expanded College Football Playoff.Belichick became North Carolina’s head coach in 2025, taking his first job at the college level after leaving the New England Patriots following the 2024 NFL season.Before going to Chapel Hill, he spent months on television. He appeared on “Monday Night Football’s ManningCast” with Peyton Manning and Eli Manning and also made regular appearances on The Pat McAfee Show.Now, Bill Belichick is mixing both worlds. He is still leading North Carolina’s rebuild, but he is also stepping back into the media spotlight.ESPN’s announcement said the move brings “one of football’s greatest minds” back to the broadcast booth.Bill Belichick is the only head coach in NFL history to win six Super Bowls with one team. He also won two more Super Bowls as a defensive coordinator with the New York Giants.While returning to television, Bill Belichick has stayed busy on the recruiting trail. One of his biggest recent moves was bringing in quarterback Billy Edwards Jr. to Chapel Hill.ESPN’s Pete Thamel reported that Edwards chose North Carolina after being granted a medical redshirt, giving him one more year of college eligibility.Billy Edwards Jr., a Virginia native, transferred to Wisconsin in August 2025 after playing at Maryland.He later suffered a knee injury and missed the rest of the season. Now, he will compete with Gio Lopez for the Tar Heels’ starting job.He will also work under Belichick and new offensive coordinator Bobby Petrino, another longtime NFL coach.The addition matters for a North Carolina team that struggled badly. The Tar Heels beat only two Power Four teams, Syracuse and Stanford, during the 2025 season.Off the field, Bill Belichick has also faced attention around his personal life, including heavy media focus on his relationship with Jordon Hudson.Despite the noise, sources around the program say Belichick has stayed locked in on recruiting and player development.North Carolina will next hold its spring game on April 12 at Kenan Stadium, where fans will get their first look at the new roster.
Article Summary: Bill belichick will appear on the acc network’s broadcast of the college football playoff national championship game. The game will feature the indiana hoosiers against the university of miami hurricanes. Espn announced that belichick will be part of the on-air team, marking his return to tv while he continues working as head coach of the tar heels.

Article Title: Bill Elliott and Cindy Elliott combined net worth: NASCAR legacy, career details, lifestyle, and more
Article Text:
Bill Elliott and Cindy Elliott (Image Source: Facebook)

NASCAR achievement, income, and net worth of Bill Elliott

The profile of Cindy Elliott and their net worth

Bill Elliott is one of the most mythical figures in the history of NASCAR, who was a respected person in terms of speed, consistency, and long-term contribution to the sphere of stock-car racing. Awesome Bill of Dawsonville, a former NASCAR Cup Series champion, is a fan favourite, having set performance records throughout his career and making a mark over the decades.Off the track, Elliott has established an enduring brand through endorsement deals and business ventures, helping him achieve significant financial success. His wife, Cindy Elliott, has mostly stayed behind the scenes, yet she has continued to support him in sustaining his career and post-racing legacy projects.The reported net worth of Bill Elliott is approximately $5 million as of 2026, based on his income, sponsorship agreements, and business throughout a long and illustrious career. Once starting at the end of the 1970s, Elliott began ascending to the top in the 1980s, winning the NASCAR Cup Series Championship and several major events, including the Daytona 500 in 1985 and 1987.At the height of his career, Elliott received huge prize money and lucrative sponsorship deals with companies like Harry Mellings, Coors Beer, and Budweiser, which helped raise his profile and augment his income.Upon leaving the full-time competition in the early 2000s, Elliott remained in the sport, doing the odd start, owning teams, and making appearances at events, which further kept him relevant and generated revenue streams. He also ventured into businesses related to automotive and motorsport memorabilia, which added to his general financial landscape.Cindy Elliott's net worth is not publicly recorded because she has been more closely tied to the family and Bill's career than to commercial activities. Although she lives a great lifestyle away from the sports world, Cindy shares a lot of her personal life happenings thrugh her social media handles.The combined net worth of Bill and Cindy Elliott is estimated at $35-$40 million. Their culture is a combination of their racing background, business, and their devotion to the NASCAR community.
Article Summary: The reported net worth of bill elliott is approximately $5 million as of 2026, based on his income, sponsorship agreements, and business. His wife, cindy elliott, has mostly stayed behind the scenes, yet she has continued to support him in sustaining his career and post-racing legacy projects.

Article Title: Marcus Foligno's first-ever hat trick helps Minnesota Wild dominate Toronto Maple Leafs with 6-3 win
Article Text:
Marcus Foligno (via Getty Images)

Minnesota Wild controls early stages of play to withstand Maple Leafs' push



Marcus Foligno Notches First Career Hat Trick vs. Maple Leafs

Marcus Foligno gave a historic performance on Monday night, with his first career hat trick to lead the Minnesota Wild in beating the Toronto Maple Leafs 6-3 on the road. He completed his hat trick with an empty-net goal in the third period, breaking the home-winning streak of the Toronto Maple Leafs.The Minnesota Wild had the game in hand, going up by four before fending off their best effort in the third period. Their balanced attack, strong power play, and disciplined defensive systems overwhelmed the Maple Leafs, who opened a five-game homestand hoping to shake off an iffy road trip.The Minnesota Wild made little wait to set the tempo, burying a power play goal midway through the first period. Vladimir Tarasenko scored from a cross-crease pass to put Toronto on its heels and opened a multi-goal hole that Minnesota made no effort to fill, scoring again from the crease through Ryan Hartman to give it an early 2-0 edge.The Toronto Maple Leafs finally capitalized towards the end of the first period as John Tavares completed a power-play opportunity from the slot, reducing the gap by half and momentarily steadying the momentum. This surge was, however, short-lived for Toronto as Minnesota soon regained momentum in the early portion of the second frame. Foligno redirected a point shot, restoring the two-goal margin, paying homage to the Wild for their efforts in parking the presence in front of the crease and crowding the middle ice.The pace quickly escalated as Tarasenko dished past the defense and wristed the puck past Joseph Woll, giving the Blues a 4-1 lead. The Wild continued to apply pressure to the Toronto defense, and Foligno scored once more with the main advantage late in the second period, tipping the puck past the defense from the point to give the Wild a commanding lead going into the third period.Foligno sealed any hopes of a comeback attempt with an empty-net goal, finishing his hat trick in his 915th game in the NHL. This is a career milestone for the player, having only achieved 12 instances of scoring two goals in a game before this.
Article Summary: Marcus foligno scored his first career hat trick to lead the minnesota wild in beating the toronto maple leafs 6-3 on the road. He completed his hat trick with an empty-net goal in the third period. This is a career milestone for the player, having only achieved 12 instances of scoring two goals in a game before this.

Article Title: Three road trips that could shape the Toronto Blue Jays’ 2026 campaign
Article Text:
Vladimir Guerrero Jr. (Image Source: Getty)

High expectations and a season on the line

Chicago White Sox (April 2–5)

New York Yankees (May 18–21)

Seattle Mariners (July 3–5)

Why these road trips matter for Blue Jays

The Toronto Blue Jays have a lot of expectations regarding the 2026 season of the MLB, as they were beaten by only slight margins in the World Series last year. As the roster was reinforced by newcomers and the team was once again on the quest to win the championship, a number of road trips can be viewed as possible turning points. The depth, the strength, and the consistency of a team are usually put to the test when they are away, and these three series may prove to be conclusive in the season of Toronto.The first major road test by Toronto is against the Chicago white Sox, early. Although Chicago cannot be regarded as a powerhouse, the early-season games can precondition the months. An impressive performance in this series would enable the Blue Jays to gain confidence and momentum during the transition between Spring Training and the regular season grind. It also offers a competitive environment where the new players get a chance to bond outside of the home.There is no other rivalry in baseball that can be compared to the level of Blue Jays vs Yankees, and this Bronx series might have significant consequences on the American League East ranking. New York is among the most challenging divisional rivals of Toronto, and it is never easy to win on the ground in Yankee Stadium.This series will probably put Toronto to the test with the pitching strength, the lineup composition, and the psychological strength.It is a West Coast road trip to Seattle, which comes at a critical junction of the season. The Mariners have a good home track record and a competitive team, and this is not the place any other team wants to work. In the case of Toronto, this series may spell the difference between the club continuing momentum into the second half, or it may get tired and be weighed down by travel.As a group, these three road trips offer a combination of early-season foundation building, pressure-induced rivalry, and endurance-induced pressure in the middle of the first half. The Blue Jays' performance in Chicago, New York, and Seattle may play a major role in their path in the 2026 season.Being able to be consistent on the road has always been a characteristic of the championship teams, and the fact that Toronto overcame such obstacles might actually be what determines whether they will go back to the World Series with business to finish or another season of close calls.
Article Summary: The toronto blue jays have a lot of expectations regarding the 2026 season of the mlb. As the roster was reinforced by newcomers and the team was once again on the quest to win the championship, a number of road trips can be viewed as possible turning points.

Article Title: Kobe Bryant's wife Vanessa Bryant melts hearts with emotional birthday tribute to daughter Natalia while honoring the late NBA legend
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant and Natalia Bryant share a close bond (Image via Getty Images)

Vanessa Bryant celebrates Natalia’s 23rd birthday with heartfelt message and cherished family memories

Vanessa Bryant’s past birthday tributes highlight her enduring love and pride for Natalia

Natalia, the daughter of Kobe and Vanessa Bryant, turned 23 on Monday, January 19. Her mother posted the cutest message and photos for her. Mrs. Bryant wrote an heartwarming message and didn't leave out Kobe or their daughter Gianna "Gigi" Bryant.The post came only a few months after Natalia and New York Knicks All-Star Jalen Brunson starred in a recent Nike commercial for the Kobe 3 Protro sneakers. Natalia continued her father's legacy with the Nike Kobe line. As a craftswoman, she questioned Brunson about his "clutch" capacity to wear Kobe's shoe, emphasizing its importance.Vanessa had a lovely note for her and Kobe's eldest daughter on her birthday. The NBA legend's widow marked Natalia's 23rd birthday on Monday with a touching social media post. The caption said:“Happy 23rd birthday @nataliabryant We love you so much! You’re such a blessing and a gift to everyone that meets you. We are so proud of the kind and caring person you are! Wishing you the very best, always. We love you always & forever- mommy, daddy, Gigi, BB and Koko…”ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Vanessa's tribute featured a number of adorable old photos, one of which showed her standing close to a much younger Natalia at an ice rink. In a second photo, the mother and daughter were seen having fun against in front of a icy mountain.After that, she shared some adorable photos of herself with a young Nat.She also uploaded a few of them with Gigi as well.Natalia has undoubtedly been making her mother proud lately. She has already made good use of her skills after earning a degree in cinema from USC last spring by working as the creative director of a commercial video for the Los Angeles Lakers.In addition, she has walked as a model in New York, Milan, and Paris and participated in a Nike commercial with New York Knicks All-Star Jalen Brunson to promote her father's sneaker business.Vanessa also has two daughters, Capri, age six, and Bianka, age nine. When Gigi and Kobe died in the helicopter crash on January 26, 2020, Gigi was 13 years old. They would undoubtedly be smilling when they saw Natalia and the 23-year-old woman she has grown into.Vanessa and Natalia are actually pretty close. Vanessa had previously celebrated Natalia's birthday. In a touching message last year, the wife of NBA legend Kobe Bryant honored the birthday of her firstborn daughter.She made her 22nd birthday unforgettable by posting a number of pictures in a video on Instagram. This also attracted the attention of the fans. She wrote in the caption:“To my firstborn… I love you so much! I’m so proud of the beautiful, smart, talented and loving young woman you are! You are kindness, light and love personified! Happy 22nd birthday @nataliabryant !!! We love you so much Nani-Banani!”Nat is a talented woman, who recently grabbed the headlines for starring alongside current NBA player Jalen Brunson in a Nike sneaker commercial.
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant celebrated natalia's 23rd birthday on monday, january 19. The nba legend's widow shared a touching message and photos for her daughter. Vanessa also has two daughters, capri, age six, and bianka, age nine. When gigi and kobe died in the helicopter crash, gigi was 13 years old.

Article Title: Indiana Hoosiers fans flood Bloomington streets after Fernando Mendoza delivers college’s first national championship
Article Text:
Fernando Mendoza (Image Via Getty)

Fernando Mendoza sparks wild scenes in Bloomington after Indiana’s first national championship

Fernando Mendoza delivered the biggest win in Indiana football history on Monday night. The Indiana Hoosiers defeated the Miami Hurricanes 27–21 in the College Football Playoff National Championship game, giving the school its first national title. The moment the final whistle blew, fans in Bloomington, Indiana, poured into the streets to celebrate what many are calling a once-in-a-lifetime night.As soon as the win was sealed, downtown Bloomington turned into a huge party. Thousands of Indiana Hoosier fans packed the highways, causing traffic obstructions and cheering late into the night. Videos from the incident showing just how crazy the party got went around the internet very fast.After Fernando Mendoza and the Indiana Hoosiers secured the win, fans rushed into downtown Bloomington. People climbed street poles, light posts, and even buildings.Some were seen standing and dancing on rooftops while others waved flags and hugged strangers. Police came shortly after to send supporters from the structures back to the streets.Most listened and descended carefully; some, however, fell into hedges attempting to get back down.Still, the atmosphere remained upbeat. Car horns echoed, music played loudly, and red-and-white colors filled the night.The Hoosiers entered the game ranked No. 1 and faced a tough No. 10 Miami Hurricanes team. The match stayed close until the end. A late defensive stop helped Indiana protect its lead and lock in the 27–21 victory.The win completed a perfect 16–0 season for Indiana. Fernando Mendoza once again led the way. The 22-year-old quarterback is already being talked about as a possible No. 1 pick in the upcoming NFL Draft.While Bloomington celebrated, some of the Indiana players marked the win in Miami, Florida. Fernando Mendoza, center Mike Katic, and a few teammates were later seen at the Miami nightclub E11even, where they celebrated the championship together after the game.Before the night of fun, Fernando Mendoza spoke with reporters and shared a personal moment. He reminded people that his road was not always easy.“I was a two-star recruit coming out of high school,” Mendoza said. “I got declined a walk-on offer to the University of Miami. So this is a full-circle moment for me.”The title game was played at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami, making the win even more meaningful for Mendoza, who once hoped to play there. Instead, he returned as a national champion. For Indiana fans, this night will be remembered forever.From packed streets to rooftop cheers, the city showed what this championship meant. And at the center of it all stood Fernando Mendoza, holding the trophy and changing Indiana football history.
Article Summary: The indiana hoosiers defeated the miami hurricanes 27–21 in the college football playoff national championship game. The win completed a perfect 16–0 season for indiana. Fernando mendoza is already being talked about as a possible no. 1 pick in the upcoming nfl draft.

Article Title: Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion spark viral buzz after playful golf date video takes over social media
Article Text:
Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion. Image via: Getty Images

Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion stole spotlight as affectionate dance moves lit up their golf date

Klay Thompson’s heartfelt message to girlfriend Megan Thee Stallion leaves everyone awestruck

The Dallas Mavericks star Klay Thompson and his girlfriend, Megan Thee Stallion , are one of the most happening couples in the big league. They make it to the top of all media outlets almost every day. In a similar occurrence of events, NBA star Thompson was spotted with Thee Stallion at a golf date, which appeared to be a club, complete with romantic lighting and ambiance.The couple was playing golf and dancing with each other, with Thompson’s hands all over his girlfriend. This video went viral moments after “TMZ Sports” posted it on Instagram. Thompson and Thee Stallion have been dating since July 2025, and the couple never shielded their PDA in front of the camera.Earlier, social media was abuzz with a video of the famous NBA couple, Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion. The clip featured them attending what appeared to be a club or a fancy restaurant, where the couple was playing golf and dancing to an early 2000s song. The couple showed some affectionate moves while boasting Thee Stallion’s golfing skills.The video immediately went viral on social media, with many fans reacting to it. The couple went public with their relationship in July 2025, and ever since haven’t shied away from the camera. During that very year, the couple made a red carpet debut at the Pete and Thomas Foundation Gala. Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion had been posting a lot since their hard launch, garnering the attention of every media outlet.A couple of days ago, NBA star Klay Thompson was spotted recording his girlfriend’s recent successful endorsement with the very famous Dunkin' Donuts. As Thee Stallion recorded this incident, she asked Thompson if he was proud of how far she had come, now that she had partnered with a high-end brand.Klay Thompson’s two-word reply was enough to boost his girlfriend’s accomplishments. He said, “Very Proud”. The Stallion had been very supportive of her boyfriend’s basketball career and had even attended many matches to cheer him up along the courtside.
Article Summary: Dallas mavericks star klay thompson and his girlfriend, megan thee stallion, are one of the most happening couples in the big league. The couple went public with their relationship in july 2025, and ever since haven’t shied away from the camera.

Article Title: Angela Lee shares her version of "2026 is the new 2016" trend, reminisces her memories of the magical year
Article Text:
Angela Lee (via Getty Images)

Angela Lee revisits historic 2016, retired ONE champion joins viral throwback trend



Retired ONE Championship star Angela Lee has joined a viral social media trend that takes people back to the year 2016. The trend encourages users to share photos from that year. For Lee, 2016 was not just another year. It was the moment that changed her life forever. At just 19 years old, she became a world champion and created history inside the ONE Championship cage.Lee, who officially retired from mixed martial arts in 2023, shared a carousel of old photos on social media. The images included memories from her title-winning moment and personal highlights from that year. The post quickly caught attention from fans, as it showed the early days of a fighter who would go on to become one of ONE Championship’s biggest stars.Angela Lee used the 2016 throwback trend to look back on what she described as the start of everything. She shared that becoming a world champion felt like achieving a dream she believed would last her entire life. At 19, she felt fearless, powerful, and completely confident in her journey. Looking at the decade old photos, she wrote that she was happy for her younger self, who was living her dream.She also spoke about personal memories from that year. Lee mentioned her beloved dog Rocky and recalled how her relationship with her husband, Bruno Pucci, first began.These moments made 2016 even more special beyond the championship belt.Lee ended her reflection by saying that while a lot can change in one year, ten years can feel like a whole lifetime. She shared that many people are talking about 2016, but for her, it marked the beginning of her story. She expressed gratitude for her past and excitement for what lies ahead.Angela Lee made history in May 2016 when she defeated Japanese veteran Mei Yamaguchi at ONE: Ascent to Power in Singapore. She won the inaugural ONE atomweight MMA world title by unanimous decision after five tough rounds. Lee went on to defend her title five times, with her final defense coming against Stamp Fairtex in March 2022.After the tragic passing of her sister Victoria in 2022, Lee stepped away from competition. She retired in September 2023 and chose to focus on family life.
Article Summary: Angela lee made history in may 2016 when she defeated japanese veteran mei yamaguchi at one: ascent to power in singapore. She won the inaugural one atomweight mma world title by unanimous decision after five tough rounds. Lee went on to defend her title five times, with her final defense coming against stamp fairtex in march 2022.

Article Title: “ I burnt myself a bit”- Nathan Aspinall admits he overtime sun time ahead of Saudi Darts Masters
Article Text:
Nathan Aspinall (via Getty)

Nathan Aspinall opens up about being sun-soaked ahead of Saudi Darts Masters quarter-final



Nathan Aspinall has admitted that he pushed himself a little too hard off the oche while preparing for the Saudi Darts Masters. The English darts star has been competing in the Middle East and arrived in Riyadh after a strong showing at the Bahrain Darts Masters. There, Aspinall reached the semi-finals before losing 7-4 to Gian van Veen. Despite the loss, his form has remained sharp.The 34-year-old returned to action in Saudi Arabia on Tuesday night and produced an impressive performance. Aspinall defeated Lourence Ilagan 6-1 in the first round, recording an average of 100.93. While his darts were on fire, the conditions off the stage were just as intense, with hot weather playing its part in his preparation.After his dominant win over Ilagan, Nathan Aspinall joked that the weather had been just as challenging as his opponent. He explained that temperatures were around 25 degrees and that he had not played competitively since Bahrain. After arriving in Saudi Arabia on Sunday, he spent time relaxing by the pool instead of practicing.Aspinall said the sunny conditions were enjoyable but admitted he stayed out too long.He shared that his skin showed clear signs of spending too much time in the sun. According to him, this was his first visit to Saudi Arabia, and he fully embraced the warm weather, perhaps a bit too much.The Stockport-based player went on to admit that this is something he often does. He explained that whenever he goes on holiday, he tends to overdo it on the very first day. He said he ended up feeling extremely hot and sunburnt, even joking that he had given himself mild sunstroke. Despite that, he added that he planned to be back by the pool again the following day.On the sporting side, Aspinall now turns his attention to the quarter-finals. He will face Man Lok Leung, who caused a surprise by beating Danny Noppert 6-3. It will be a tough test, but Aspinall’s recent form suggests he is ready.There is also plenty at stake. The winner of the quarter-final match is guaranteed at least $10,000 for reaching the semi-finals. The player who loses will still earn $5,000 for making the last eight. The overall winner of the Saudi Darts Masters will take home a top prize of $30,000, adding extra motivation for Aspinall as he continues his run in Riyadh.
Article Summary: Nathan aspinall is in saudi arabia for the saudi darts masters. The 34-year-old beat lourence ilagan 6-1 in the first round on tuesday. He will now face man lok leung in the quarter-finals.

Article Title: Elina Svitolina and Gael Monfils combined net worth: How years on the tennis tour built their growing fortune
Article Text:
Elina Svitolina and Gael Monfils combined net worth: How years on the tennis tour built their growing fortune (Image via Getty)

Elina Svitolina career earnings and net worth

Gael Monfils career earnings and net worth

How Elina Svitolina and Gael Monfils earn money off court

Elina Svitolina and Gael Monfils combined net worth today



Elina Svitolina and Gael Monfils are one of tennis’s most loved couples. One comes from Ukraine, the other from France, but their journey on court and in life is shared. Over many years in pro tennis, both players earned strong prize money and brand deals. Here is a breakdown of their combined net worth.Elina Svitolina has been one of the most steady players on the WTA Tour for over a decade. According to the official WTA website, she has earned over $25 million in career prize money from singles and doubles matches.She has also signed long-term deals with brands like Wilson, Adidas (earlier), and luxury watch brand Rolex, as reported by Forbes and brand press releases. These deals added several million dollars over the years.After returning from maternity leave in 2023, Svitolina reached the Wimbledon semifinals and stayed active on tour in 2024 and 2025. Based on prize money, endorsements, and investments, her individual net worth is estimated at around $18–20 million.The ATP career of Gael Monfils has been a very rewarding one with a long duration. The male tennis top-tier events have credited him with over $22 million as of today in career prize money, with this money coming from Grand Slams, Masters events, and ATP victories.Gael Monfils is also known for strong endorsement deals. He has worked with Asics, Artengo, and Rolex, along with paid appearances and exhibitions. Forbes has previously listed him among tennis’s top earners outside the court.Even in his late 30s, Monfils continued to play tour events in 2024 and early 2025. With steady income and no public financial issues, his net worth is estimated at around $20–22 million.The two tennis stars get more than just match prize money as their income source. Together with their brand endorsements, social media collaborations, appearance fees, and smart investments, they earn a lot more. Monfils's income includes tennis exhibitions whereas Svitolina is involved with global brands, and charity events.They don’t make extravagant public appearances, and their financial affairs are secret, which is an advantage in the long run for the protection of wealth. Forbes mentions that tennis couples with lengthy careers do not lose their endorsement income even after their playing years have peaked and thus they are stable-income endorsed.When their finances are added together, Elina Svitolina and Gael Monfils have a combined net worth of about $40-42 million. This figure is based on ATP and WTA prize money records, Forbes estimates, and confirmed brand partnerships.The couple married in July 2021 and welcomed their daughter Skai in October 2022. In late 2025, both shared family moments during the off-season on social media while preparing for the new tennis year.Their story is not just about money. It is about long careers, smart choices, and steady success, both on and off the court.
Article Summary: Elina svitolina and gael monfils are one of tennis’s most loved couples. One comes from ukraine, the other from france. Over many years in pro tennis, both players earned strong prize money and brand deals. Here is a breakdown of their combined net worth.

Article Title: Green Day set to headline Super Bowl LX opening ceremony as NFL blends legacy, culture, and global music
Article Text:
Green Day (via Getty Images)

A hometown band leads a celebration of Super Bowl history and global music

The NFL has officially unveiled a major piece of its Super Bowl LX spectacle, and attendees are sure to get the ‘time of their lives’ with the new announcement. The legendary rock band Green Day is now confirmed to be headlining the opening ceremony of Super Bowl LX, scheduled for February 8 at Levi’s Stadium in Santa Clara, California.Green Day’s involvement carries special meaning as the iconic band was formed in California, and this Super Bowl LX performance becomes a homecoming moment for them. Billie Joe Armstrong expressed his excitement for the same, and the band joins a fantastic list of A-list artists who are set to entertain and thrill audiences on the day.Green Day’s lead vocalist, Billie Joe Armstrong, shared his enthusiasm for the upcoming performance in a statement, saying, "We are very excited to kick off Super Bowl 60 in our home stadium." The band, which also includes Mike Dirnt and Tré Cool, will help honor the legacy of the game while energizing a new generation of fans.The NFL sees this as a landmark occasion, with Tim Tubito, NFL Chief Events Officer, emphasizing the importance of the moment. In his statement, he said, "Celebrating 60 years of Super Bowl history with Green Day as the headlining act, while also honoring NFL legends, is an incredibly moving way to kick off Super Bowl LX.We look forward to creating a collective celebration for fans in the stadium and around the world. "Green Day joins an array of artists, including Charlie Puth, Brandi Carlile, and Coco Jones, who are also part of the opening ceremony lineup, adding a variety of genres and broad appeal for fans. Meanwhile, Bad Bunny will headline the halftime show, a choice that sparked strong reactions when first announced last September.Bad Bunny recently released a promotional video titled "On February 8th, the world will dance." The clip, which highlights his song ‘Unforgettable Dance,’ featured people from different backgrounds sharing the spotlight. The message of cultural openness resonated widely with fans worldwide, pushing the video past 3 million likes shortly after release.
Article Summary: Green day will be headlining the opening ceremony of super bowl lx. The band was formed in california, and this performance becomes a homecoming moment for them. Bad bunny will headline the halftime show, a choice that sparked strong reactions when first announced last september.

Article Title: Did Indore crowd chant 'Gautam Gambhir haye haye'? Fact check on Virat Kohli reaction
Article Text:
Gautam Gambhir and Virat Kohli (Image credit: Agencies)

Shubman Gill on missed chances, fielding lapses & World Cup preparation after ODI series loss

WATCH:

IND vs NZ

T20I Full Schedule:

IND vs NZ T20I Squads:

India

New Zealand:

NEW DELHI: A video claiming that the Indore crowd shouted “ Gautam Gambhir haaye haaye” after the third ODI against New Zealand has gone viral on social media, but the claim is misleading. The clip shows Virat Kohli reacting during the post-match presentation at the Holkar Stadium, and many users linked his reaction to alleged chants against head coach Gautam Gambhir.After India lost the match and the series 2-1, the video was widely shared on X and Instagram.Some fans said the chants showed anger towards the team management after recent home series losses, while others read different meanings into Kohli’s body language.However, a fact check suggests the crowd did not target Gambhir in Indore.Journalists and media personnel present at the stadium have said they did not hear any such chants during the ceremony. While the video visuals are real and were shot in Indore, the audio does not appear to be genuine.The sound in the clip seems to be taken from an older incident in Guwahati, where similar chants were heard during a Test match last year.The same audio pattern matches that earlier event, indicating the video was edited.This is important because misleading videos can create unnecessary controversy, especially when the team is already under pressure.Based on available information, the viral clip should not be seen as proof that the Indore crowd shouted slogans against Gautam Gambhir.With the 2-1 result, the Black Caps won an ODI series in India for the first time in 37 years, following their 3-0 Test series whitewash against India last year.India, however, have little time to dwell on the setback. The focus shifts to the shortest format, with a five-match T20I series against New Zealand starting Wednesday as part of the final build-up to the T20 World Cup. With less than three weeks remaining, the series serves as a vital dress rehearsal.The spotlight will be on captain Suryakumar Yadav. Since taking over as India’s T20I skipper in 2024, he has led the side to a winning percentage above 72, even as his batting form has remained under scrutiny. Playing at home, with expectations of defending the T20 World Cup title again.1st T20I: Jan 21 in Nagpur from 7 PM IST2nd T20I: Jan 23 in Raipur from 7 PM IST3rd T20I: Jan 25 in Guwahati from 7 PM IST4th T20I: Jan 28 in Visakhapatnam from 7 PM IST5th T20I: Jan 31 in Thiruvanthapuram from 7 PM IST: Suryakumar Yadav (captain), Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson (wk), Ishan Kishan, Shreyas Iyer , , Shivam Dube, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Jasprit Bumrah, Varun Chakravarthy, Rinku Singh, Arshdeep Singh, Ravi Bishnoi, Harshit Rana.Mitchell Santner (captain), Devon Conway, Bevon Jacobs, , Glenn Phillips, Tim Robinson, Jimmy Neesham, Ish Sodi, Zak Foulkes, Mark Chapman, Michael Bracewell, Rachin Ravindra, Kyle Jamieson, Matt Henry, Jacob Duffy, Kristian Clarke
Article Summary: A video claiming that the indore crowd shouted “ gautam gambhir haaye haaye” after the third odi against new zealand has gone viral on social media. The clip shows virat kohli reacting during the post-match presentation at the holkar stadium. Many users linked his reaction to alleged chants against head coach gautam gambhirs.

Article Title: ‘Easier said than done’: Virat Kohli's brother hits back at Sanjay Manjrekar as star silences critics with another century
Article Text:
Virat Kohli (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Shubman Gill on missed chances, fielding lapses & World Cup preparation after ODI series loss

NEW DELHI: Virat Kohli ’s bat once again became the loudest response after India lost the three-match ODI series against New Zealand 1-2, with the former captain’s elder brother Vikas Kohli taking a pointed swipe at critics questioning the great’s choices late in his career.India went down by 41 runs in the series decider in Indore, but Kohli stood tall amid the collapse, producing a sublime 124 while chasing a daunting 338. Across the three matches, the 37-year-old amassed 240 runs at an average of 80, with scores of 93, 23 and 124, underlining his enduring dominance in the format.The knock came days after former India batter and commentator Sanjay Manjrekar questioned Kohli’s decision to retire from Test cricket and continue in what he described as the “easy” format of ODIs. The remark, made during the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney where Joe Root and Steve Smith struck centuries, drew widespread criticism from fans.Vikas Kohli joined the chorus on Sunday, soon after Virat registered his 54th ODI hundred and 85th international ton. In a post on Threads that has since gone viral, he aimed a sharp barb at Manjrekar. “I wonder if Mr Expert of cricket has some suggestions for the easiest form of cricket.You need to be there to do that. Anyways, as I said, Easier said than done,” he wrote.The numbers back the sentiment. In Kohli’s last six ODIs, he has scored three centuries and two half-centuries. He also struck a hundred and a fifty for Delhi in the Vijay Hazare Trophy, silencing doubts about his motivation after stepping away from Tests.Kohli will next feature in India colours in July 2026 during the England ODI tour. Before that, he will turn his focus to IPL 2026, aiming to help Royal Challengers Bengaluru defend their title.
Article Summary: India lost the three-match odi series against new zealand 1-2. India went down by 41 runs in the series decider in indore. Kohli stood tall amid the collapse, producing a sublime 124. The 37-year-old amassed 240 runs at an average of 80.

Article Title: Virat Kohli rewrites ODI history, surpasses Ricky Ponting to become the highest ever to…
Article Text:
India's Virat Kohli (AP Photo/Rafiq Maqbool)

The making of Cooper Connolly: Australia’s 22-year-old star

Most hundreds vs NZ (ODIs)

NEW DELHI: Run-machine Virat Kohli once again proved why he remains the heartbeat of India’s ODI batting, producing a majestic century against New Zealand in the third and final match of the series on Sunday. In a chase that looked to be slipping away early, Kohli stood tall, registering his record-extending 54th ODI hundred - 85th overall in international cricket, and keeping India’s hopes alive deep into the innings.This knock also carried historic significance. Kohli, who finished the match with 12,662 runs batting at number three in ODIs, has now gone past Australian great Ricky Ponting ’s tally of 12,655 to become the highest run-scorer in the format at that crucial position.7 - Virat Kohli (36 inns)*6 - Ricky Ponting (50 inns)6 - Virender Sehwag (23 inns)5 - Sachin Tendulkar (41 inns)5 - Sanath Jayasuriya (45 inns)Kohli also climbed to the top of another elite list. He now has the most ODI hundreds against New Zealand, with seven centuries in just 36 innings. Only Ricky Ponting and Virender Sehwag come close, with six each, while legends Sachin Tendulkar and Sanath Jayasuriya finished with five apiece.The century came at a critical moment. India were reeling at 71 for four after New Zealand posted a daunting 337 for eight. On a wicket that demanded composure, Kohli opted for control and persistence. He brought up his hundred with a single off Zak Foulkes on the final ball of the 40th over, having struck eight fours and two sixes in a 91-ball innings.It marked a landmark across formats and conditions. This was Kohli’s 85th international century, his 54th in ODIs, his 41st on Indian soil, and his seventh against New Zealand. He now has seven or more ODI hundreds against five different opponents, with 10 against Sri Lanka, nine against West Indies, eight against Australia, and seven each against South Africa and New Zealand.After missing out on a hundred in the series opener at Vadodara, where he fell for 93, Kohli made sure there was no repeat. He held one end firmly and built partnerships that dragged India back into the contest.The revival began with Nitish Kumar Reddy, who scored 53. Their 88-run stand for the fifth wicket restored belief before Kohli accelerated further alongside Harshit Rana. The pair added 99 runs in just 69 balls, with Rana contributing a fluent 52 off 43 deliveries.As long as Kohli remained at the crease, the sense persisted that another miracle was still possible. He eventually fell for a valiant 124 off 108 balls, a moment that effectively ended India’s chase. Until then, though, he had ensured belief never faded.The result may not have gone India’s way, but Kohli’s innings stood out as a reminder of his enduring greatness and his unmatched ability to make the impossible feel within reach.
Article Summary: Virat kohli scores 54th odi hundred and 85th in international cricket. He now has the most odi hundreds against new zealand, with seven centuries in just 36 innings. Only ricky ponting and virender sehwag come close, with six each.

Article Title: 'I can't do it anymore': Indian badminton star Saina Nehwal, 35, announces retirement after battle with knee injury
Article Text:
Saina Nehwal of India (Photo by Robertus Pudyanto/Getty Images)

Saina Nehwal - The Queen of Indian Badminton | House of Glory | Episode 4

NEW DELHI: India's star shuttler Saina Nehwal has confirmed her retirement from competitive badminton as she revealed on Monday that a chronic knee condition had left her unable to cope with the physical demands of the elite sport.The 2012 London Olympic bronze medallist last appeared in a competition at the Singapore Open in 2023, though she chose not to formally announce her decision at the time.Explaining her decision, Saina said on a podcast, “I had stopped playing two years back. I actually felt that I entered the sport on my own terms and left on my own terms, so there was no need to announce it.”She added, “If you are not capable of playing anymore, that’s it. It’s fine.”The former world No. 1 said her decision was driven by severe knee degeneration that made sustained training impossible.Detailing the medical reality, she explained, "Your cartiledge has totally degenerated, you have arthritis, that's what my parents needed to know that, my coaches needed to know that, and I just told them, 'Now probably I can't do it anymore, it is difficult'.""Slowly people will also realise that Saina is not playing," she added.“I didn’t think it was such a big matter to announce my retirement. I just felt my time was up because I couldn’t push much, that my knee is not able to push like before."Highlighting the contrast with her peak years, Saina noted, "You train eight to nine hours to be the best in the world, now my knee was giving up in one or two hours. It was swelling and it became very tough to push after that. So I thought it’s enough. I can’t push it anymore.”Her career was significantly affected by a knee injury sustained at the Rio 2016 Olympics.While she mounted a strong comeback with a World Championships bronze in 2017 and Commonwealth Games gold in 2018, recurring issues persisted.In 2024, she revealed she has arthritis and worn cartilage in her knees.
Article Summary: India's star shuttler saina nehwal has confirmed her retirement from competitive badminton. The 2012 london olympic bronze medallist last appeared in a competition at the singapore open in 2023. The former world no. 1 said her decision was driven by severe knee degeneration that made sustained training impossible.

Article Title: 'Make some noise': Pakistan's Ramiz Raja embarrasses himself in front of Bangladesh crowd - Watch
Article Text:
Pakistan's Ramiz Raja embarrasses himself in front of Bangladesh crowd (Screengrabs)

The making of Cooper Connolly: Australia’s 22-year-old star

NEW DELHI: Former Pakistan captain and well-known cricket commentator Ramiz Raja had an awkward moment during a Bangladesh Premier League (BPL) 2025–26 match when the crowd did not respond to him.The incident happened at the toss, before the match began. Raja was on the ground with the two captains, hosting the toss as part of the broadcast team. As he often does, the 63-year-old turned towards the stands and asked the fans to “make some noise”.But instead of loud cheers, there was almost complete silence in the stadium. Only a few faint claps and shouts were heard on television. For a brief moment, Raja looked surprised by the lack of response. He quickly collected himself and continued with the toss and the captain interviews.The short clip was soon shared widely on social media platforms like Instagram and X.Many users found the moment awkward and joked about it, as some labelled it as “cringe-worthy”. The video spread fast and became a popular topic among cricket fans around the world.Watch:Some fans defended him and said the situation may not have been his fault.They pointed out that stadium microphones often fail to capture crowd noise properly.Others said the toss usually happens when many fans are still entering the ground, so the stands are not always full or loud. A few also felt that the crowd may not have clearly heard Raja’s request.Ramiz Raja has been a familiar voice in cricket for many years.Despite the brief embarrassment, the incident has not affected his reputation.
Article Summary: Pakistan's ramiz raja embarrasses himself in front of bangladesh crowd. The incident happened at the toss, before the match began. Raja was on the ground with the two captains, hosting the toss as part of the broadcast team. Despite the brief embarrassment, the incident has not affected his reputation.

Article Title: What next for Ravindra Jadeja, Rohit Sharma? Veteran stars had a poor ODI outing vs New Zealand
Article Text:
Ravindra Jadeja and Rohit Sharma

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Shubman Gill on missed chances, fielding lapses & World Cup preparation after ODI series loss

Poll Is it time for India to explore new talents in ODIs over seniors? Yes, fresh blood is needed. No, experience matters. A mix of both would be ideal. It depends on performance.

INDORE: India’s maiden ODI home series defeat to New Zealand here at the Holkar Stadium saw Virat Kohli, who smashed 124 off 108 balls in the last match, come out with flying colours. However, two other ageing modern-day greats are firmly under the scanner. Ravindra Jadeja and Rohit Sharma had a poor series, which doesn’t help with younger options snapping at their heels.The 37-year-old Jadeja went wicketless. In fact, in his last five ODIs, the Saurashtra allrounder has only managed to take one wicket. Jadeja’s leftarm spin, which once both stopped the run flow and provided crucial breakthroughs, seems to have lost its bite. Remember, T20I vice-captain Axar Patel , a like-for-like replacement, is waiting in the wings.Sreevats Goswami, who shared the dressing room with Jadeja in the 2008 U-19 World Cup that India won under Virat Kohli’s leadership, even posted on social media that the third ODI against New Zealand may well have been Jadeja’s last in the 50-over format. “We should celebrate him before he silently exits, because India play their next ODI only in June against England in England,” Goswami posted.Apart from his bowling, Jadeja has failed to make any significant contribution with the bat as well.Jadeja and fellow spinner Kuldeep Yadav’s inability to grab wickets in the middleovers was one of the key reasons for India being vanquished 2-1 by the Black Caps.Meanwhile, the debate around whether Rohit would play in the 2027 ODI World Cup was supposed to have ended after he put together a series of good scores against Australia (away) and then South Africa (home). That run included a match-winning century (121*) against Australia in Sydney, apart from three fifties. One even got to see a slimmed-down version of Rohit, indicating that he had worked a lot on his fitness.The 38-year-old’s decision to continue in ODIs has meant that left-hander Yashavi Jaiswal, who scored his maiden ODI century in the third ODI against South Africa in Vizag last Dec, has had to cool his heels in the dugout.Rohit will turn 39 on April 30 and is he motivated enough to keep playing only one format in international cricket?However, captain Shubman Gill defended his opening partner, saying, “Rohit is in terrific form, right through from the Australia to the South Africa series. You won’t always be able to convert the starts that you get.”
Article Summary: Ravindra jadeja and rohit sharma had a poor series, which doesn't help with younger options snapping at their heels. Jadeja’s leftarm spin, which once both stopped the run flow and provided crucial breakthroughs, seems to have lost its bite. The 37-year-old jadeja has only managed to take one wicket.

Article Title: No more A+ category? BCCI plans central contract overhaul as Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma likely to drop from top tier
Article Text:
Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma, and Shubman Gill. (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Shubman Gill on missed chances, fielding lapses & World Cup preparation after ODI series loss

Poll How do you feel about the removal of the Grade A+ category affecting players like Kohli and Rohit? It's unfair to senior players. It's a reasonable adjustment. I have mixed feelings about it. I support the change.

NEW DELHI: The Board of Control for Cricket in India ( BCCI ) is set to make a major overhaul in its Annual Central Contracts system, with sweeping changes that could significantly reshape the hierarchy of Indian cricket’s elite players. As per an ANI report citing sources within the BCCI, the selection committee has proposed doing away with the prestigious Grade A+ category altogether, a move that would directly impact senior stalwarts Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma.The proposal, put forward by the Ajit Agarkar-led selection committee, recommends restructuring the contracts into just three categories — A, B and C — instead of the current four-tier system. As per sources familiar with the discussions, the A+ category, which currently carries an annual retainer of Rs 7 crore, is likely to be scrapped if the model receives approval from the BCCI’s apex council.“If the new structure is cleared, players will be grouped based on current format involvement rather than stature or legacy,” a BCCI official was quoted by ANI on condition of anonymity. Under the proposed framework, Kohli and Rohit — who are now active only in ODIs — are expected to be placed in Grade B, which currently carries a retainer of Rs 3 crore.The apex council is expected to deliberate on the proposal in its next meeting, where clarity will also emerge on whether the monetary slabs will be revised along with the structural changes. “Nothing is final yet, but there is a clear intent to align contracts with workload, formats played and future planning,” another senior BCCI source added.The existing 2024-25 central contracts list, announced in April 2025, featured Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, Ravindra Jadeja and Jasprit Bumrah in Grade A+. Grade A included Mohammed Siraj, KL Rahul, Shubman Gill, Hardik Pandya , Mohammed Shami and Rishabh Pant, while Grade B housed players such as Suryakumar Yadav, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shreyas Iyer. A large pool of emerging players were placed in Grade C.Central contracts are annual retainers paid in addition to match fees and serve as both financial security and an indicator of a player’s standing in the national setup.
Article Summary: The board of control for cricket in india ( bcci ) is set to make a major overhaul in its annual central contracts system. The proposal, put forward by the ajit agarkar-led selection committee, recommends restructuring the contracts into just three categories — a, b and c.

Article Title: Tilak Varma update: India’s T20I No. 3 to reach BCCI CoE today; getting closer to regaining full fitness
Article Text:
India batter Tilak Varma

NEW DELHI:

Shubman Gill on missed chances, fielding lapses & World Cup preparation after ODI series loss

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll How do you feel about Tilak Varma's chances of returning for the fourth T20I? Very optimistic Cautiously optimistic Neutral Not optimistic

India’s designated No. 3 in T20Is, Tilak Varma, is set to reach the BCCI’s Centre of Excellence (CoE) on Tuesday, TimesofIndia.com has learnt.Tilak has been ruled out of the first three T20Is against New Zealand, starting Wednesday, after undergoing surgery in Rajkot for an abdominal issue a couple of weeks ago during the Vijay Hazare Trophy.TimesofIndia.com also understands that India’s Asia Cup hero is not feeling any pain and is heading to the CoE for a fitness test and further assessment to get Return to Play.“If everything goes well, he will be fit before the fourth T20I on January 28 in Visakhapatnam. He has resumed physical training and, in a day or two, will start batting and other skill-based activities,” a source tracking developments told TimesofIndia.com.After playing the T20I series against South Africa in December, Tilak led Hyderabad in two 50-over matches at the Vijay Hazare Trophy. He scored 109 against Chandigarh on January 3 and followed it up with 34 against Bengal on January 6. It was after this match that Tilak experienced pain and was immediately advised to undergo scans.India’s ODI vice-captain and Punjab Kings skipper Shreyas Iyer has been added to the squad for the first three matches, as Tilak has not been ruled out of the entire series.Iyer last played a T20I in December 2023 against Australia at home and had since fallen out of India’s T20I plans. He has not featured in any T20s since last year’s IPL final, missed the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy while recovering from a spleen injury, but returned for the Vijay Hazare Trophy and also featured in the recently concluded ODI series against New Zealand.Tilak has been a key member of India’s T20I setup over the past year. He scored 567 runs in 18 innings in 2025, averaging 47.25 with a strike rate of 129.15.
Article Summary: India's designated no. 3 in t20is, tilak varma, is set to reach the bcci’s centre of excellence (coe) on tuesday. Tilak has been ruled out of the first three t 20is against new zealand, starting wednesday. He underwent surgery in rajkot for an abdominal issue a couple of weeks ago during the vijay hazare trophy.
